sentence.Network_en: It is important that we dovetail our respective interests.
sentence.Network_cn: 让我们各自的利益相吻合很重要。

sentence.Network_en: The duo set up a scam to settle their respective debts.
sentence.Network_cn: 那对搭档设了一计以消除各自的债务。

sentence.Network_en: Steve and I were at very different stages in our respective careers.
sentence.Network_cn: 史蒂夫和我在各自的职业生涯中处于迥然不同的阶段。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'relative, comparative'): from medieval Latin respectivus, from respect- 'regarded, considered', from the verb respicere (see respect), reinforced by French respectif, -ive

entry.def: Respective means relating or belonging separately to the individual people you have just mentioned.

example.ex: Steve and I were at very different stages in our respective careers...
example.tran: 史蒂夫和我在各自的职业生涯中处于迥然不同的阶段。

example.ex: They went into their respective bedrooms to pack.
example.tran: 他们回到各自的卧室打包。

auth_sentence.content: Provide feedback on technical problems and their respective solutions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Provide feedback on technical problems and their respective solutions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Provide feedback on technical problems and their respective solutions.

auth_sentence.content: The two men amiably wrangle about their respective faiths.
auth_sentence.res_content: The two men amiably wrangle about their respective faiths.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two men amiably wrangle about their respective faiths.

auth_sentence.content: These companies are very dominant in their respective fields.
auth_sentence.res_content: These companies are very dominant in their respective fields.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These companies are very dominant in their respective fields.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

sentences.en: He and I are each going to visit our respective teachers.
sentences.cn: 我和他分别要去拜访各自的老师。

jushi.chinese: 那三个人按各自的才能分配了工作。
